scripts.dev: bash -c 'PORT=4000; for tool in lsof fuser; do if command -v $tool >/dev/null 2>&1; then PID=$($tool -ti :$PORT 2>/dev/null || $tool $PORT/tcp 2>/dev/null | awk "{print \$1}"); [ -n "$PID" ] && [ "$PID" != "PID" ] && kill -9 $PID 2>/dev/null && echo "포트 $PORT 프로세스 종료: PID=$PID" && sleep 1; break; fi; done' && nest start --watch
scripts.start:dev: bash -c 'PORT=4000; for tool in lsof fuser; do if command -v $tool >/dev/null 2>&1; then PID=$($tool -ti :$PORT 2>/dev/null || $tool $PORT/tcp 2>/dev/null | awk "{print \$1}"); [ -n "$PID" ] && [ "$PID" != "PID" ] && kill -9 $PID 2>/dev/null && echo "포트 $PORT 프로세스 종료: PID=$PID" && sleep 1; break; fi; done' && nest start --watch
